item.title: Imposing Code Structure Guidelines using ArchUnit
item.description: While building the software we all agree, as a team, to follow a set of guidelines which are typically considered as best practices. But during the development, developers might violate those guidelines unknowingly or ignorance. Typically we rely upon code reviews or code quality checking tools like SonarQube, PMD etc to check for such violations. But some of the guidelines could be opinionated decisions which might not be able to automate using SonarQube, PMD etc.
